title: Coronavirus Misinformation - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 4/16/20
itunes:title: Coronavirus Misinformation - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 4/16/20
description:
George Noory and reporter Alex Berenson explore his theory that the media is purposely exaggerating the death rates from coronavirus to create a panic.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
